statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT transaction_date, merchant_id FROM fraud_detection WHERE merchant_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 123 AND merchant_id = 456 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND merchant_id IN (789, 890) ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount DESC
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 999
SELECT * FROM outliers_identification ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM outliers_identification WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT transaction_amount FROM outliers_identification WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01' AND customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT id, transaction_type FROM outliers_identification WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY anomaly_type ASC
SELECT * FROM outliers_identification WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fraud_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'chargeback';
SELECT id, transaction_amount FROM outliers_identification WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT id FROM outliers_identification WHERE transaction_amount > 500);
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount), MIN(transaction_amount) FROM outliers_identification WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM outliers_detection;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM fraud_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT description FROM outliers_detection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM fraud_activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM outliers_detection WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT description, transaction_date FROM outliers_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM fraud_activities WHERE activity_type = 'fraud' ORDER BY activity_date
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM outliers_detection ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT id, data_type FROM outliers_detection WHERE data_type = 'number';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT anomaly_type FROM anomalies ORDER BY anomaly_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM outliers_data;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, status FROM anomalies WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT fraudster_id, customer_id, reason FROM fraudsters WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY fraudster_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, email FROM customers ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount < 500;
